touchPoints.notes: Root scripts expose ggp.llc-specific workspace filters for CI and local builds.
Sitemap generation and published XML embed the production domain and callback URLs.
Vite preview restricts HTTPS hosts to the guidogerbpublishing.com alias used for staging.
Seed secret file encodes the hosted UI and logout domains for automation to template.
CI/CD documentation maps the tenant domain to its environment secret name.
Local edge simulators and sync scripts enumerate the tenant hostnames.
CloudFront distribution mappings associate the tenant domain with its distribution ID.
Tenant provisioning manifest records the workspace slug consumed by automation scripts.
